00017 package WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck;
00018 
00019 =head1 NAME
00020 
00021 WeBWorK::Utils::CourseIntegrityCheck - check that course  database tables agree with database schema and
00022 that course directory structure is correct.
00023 
00024 =cut
00025 
00026 use strict;
00027 use warnings;
00028 use WeBWorK::Debug;
00029 use WeBWorK::Utils::CourseManagement qw/listCourses/;
00030 use WeBWorK::PG::IO;
00031 
00032 use constant {             # constants describing the comparison of two hashes.
00033            ONLY_IN_A=>0, 
00034            ONLY_IN_B=>1,
00035            DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B=>2, 
00036            SAME_IN_A_AND_B=>3
00037 };
00038 ################################################################################
00039 
00040 sub new {
00041     my $invocant = shift;
00042     my $class = ref $invocant || $invocant;
00043     my $self = bless {}, $class;
00044     $self->init(@_);
00045     return $self;
00046 }
00047 
00048 sub init {
00049     my ($self, %options) = @_;
00050     
00051     $self->{dbh} = DBI->connect(
00052         $options{ce}{database_dsn},
00053         $options{ce}{database_username},
00054         $options{ce}{database_password},
00055         {
00056             PrintError => 0,
00057             RaiseError => 1,
00058         },
00059     );
00060     
00061     $self->{verbose_sub} = $options{verbose_sub} || \&debug;
00062     $self->{confirm_sub} = $options{confirm_sub} || \&ask_permission_stdio;
00063     $self->{ce} = $options{ce};
00064     my $dbLayoutName = $self->{ce}->{dbLayoutName};
00065     $self->{db} =new WeBWorK::DB($self->{ce}->{dbLayouts}->{$dbLayoutName});
00066 }
00067 
00068 sub ce { return shift->{ce} }
00069 sub db { return shift->{db} }
00070 sub dbh { return shift->{dbh} }
00071 sub verbose { my $sub = shift->{verbose_sub}; return &$sub(@_) }
00072 sub confirm { my $sub = shift->{confirm_sub}; return &$sub(@_) }
00073 
00074 sub DESTROY {
00075     my ($self) = @_;
00076     $self->unlock_database;
00077     $self->SUPER::DESTROY if $self->can("SUPER::DESTROY");
00078 }

00083 
00084 =item $CIchecker->checkCourseTables($courseName);
00085 
00086 Checks the course tables in the mysql database and ensures that they are the 
00087 same as the ones specified by the databaseLayout
00088 
00089 
00090 =cut
00091 
00092 sub checkCourseTables {
00093     my ($self, $courseName) = @_;
00094     my $str='';
00095     my $tables_ok = 1;
00096     my %dbStatus = ();
00097     #################################
00098     # fetch schema from course environment and search database
00099     # for corresponding tables.
00100     ##########################################################
00101     my $db = $self->db;
00102     my $ce = $self->{ce};
00103     $self->lock_database;
00104     foreach my $table (sort keys %$db) {
00105         next if $db->{$table}{params}{non_native}; # skip non-native tables
00106         my $table_name = (exists $db->{$table}->{params}->{tableOverride})? $db->{$table}->{params}->{tableOverride}:$table;
00107         my $database_table_exists = ($db->{$table}->tableExists) ? 1:0;
00108         if ($database_table_exists ) { # exists means the table can be described;
00109            my( $fields_ok, $fieldStatus) = $self->checkTableFields($courseName, $table);
00110            if ($fields_ok) {
00111                  $dbStatus{$table} = [SAME_IN_A_AND_B()];
00112            } else {
00113                 $dbStatus{$table} = [DIFFER_IN_A_AND_B(),$fieldStatus];
00114                 $tables_ok=0;
00115            }
00116         } else {
00117             $tables_ok=0;
00118             $dbStatus{$table}=[ONLY_IN_A(),];
00119         }
00120     }
00121     ##########################################################
00122     # fetch fetch corresponding tables in the database and
00123     # search for corresponding schema entries.
00124     ##########################################################
00125  
00126     my $dbh = $self->dbh;
00127     my $tablePrefix = "${courseName}\\_";   # _ represents any single character in the MySQL like statement so we escape it
00128     my $stmt = "show tables like '${tablePrefix}%'";    # mysql request
00129     my $result = $dbh->selectall_arrayref($stmt) ;
00130     my @tableNames = map {@$_} @$result;             # drill down in the result to the table name level
00131 
00132 #  Table names are of the form courseID_table (with an underscore). So if we have two courses mth101 and mth101_fall09
00133 #  when we check the tables for mth101 we will inadvertantly pick up the tables for mth101_fall09.  Thus we find all 
00134 #  courseID's and exclude the extraneous tables.
00135 
00136     my @courseIDs = listCourses($ce);
00137     my @similarIDs =();
00138     foreach my $courseID (@courseIDs) {
00139         next unless $courseID =~/^${courseName}\_(.*)/;
00140         push(@similarIDs, $courseID);
00141     }
00142 
00143     OUTER_LOOP:
00144     foreach my $table (sort @tableNames) {
00145         next unless $table =~/^${courseName}\_(.*)/;  #double check that we only have our course tables and similar ones
00146 
00147         foreach my $courseID (@similarIDs) {          #exclude tables with similar but wrong names
00148         next OUTER_LOOP if $table =~/^${courseID}\_(.*)/;
00149         }
00150 
00151         my $schema_name = $1;
00152         my $exists = exists($db->{$schema_name});
00153         $tables_ok = 0 unless exists($db->{$schema_name});
00154         $dbStatus{$schema_name} =[ONLY_IN_B] unless $exists;
00155     }
00156     $self->unlock_database;
00157     return ($tables_ok,\%dbStatus); # table in both schema & database; found in schema only; found in database only
00158 }
00159 
00160 =item $CIchecker-> updateCourseTables($courseName,  $table_names);
00161 
00162 Adds schema tables to the database that had been missing from the database.
00163 
00164 =cut
00165 
00166 sub updateCourseTables {
00167     my ($self, $courseName, $schema_table_names) = @_;
00168     my $db = $self->db;
00169     $self->lock_database;
00170     warn "Programmers: Pass reference to the array of table names to be updated." unless ref($schema_table_names)=~/ARRAY/;
00171     # warn "table names are ".join(" ", @$schema_table_names);
00172     my $str='';
00173     foreach my $schema_table_name (sort @$schema_table_names) {    # remainder copied from db->create_table
00174         # next if $table =~ /^_/; # skip non-table self fields (none yet)
00175         # warn "not a non-table self field";
00176         next if $db->{$schema_table_name}{params}{non_native}; # skip non-native tables
00177         my $schema_obj = $db->{$schema_table_name};
00178         my $database_table_name = (exists $db->{$schema_table_name}->{params}->{tableOverride})? 
00179                            $db->{$schema_table_name}->{params}->{tableOverride}:$schema_table_name;
00180         if ($schema_obj->can("create_table")) {
00181            # warn "creating table $schema_obj";
00182             $schema_obj->create_table;
00183             $str .= "Table $schema_table_name created as $database_table_name in database.".CGI::br();
00184         } else {
00185             warn "Skipping creation of '$schema_table_name' table: no create_table method\n";
00186         }
00187     }
00188     $self->unlock_database;
00189     $str;
00190     
00191 }
00192

00197 =item  $CIchecker->checkTableFields($courseName, $table);
00198 
00199 Checks the course tables in the mysql database and insures that they are the same as the ones specified by the databaseLayout
00200 
00201 
00202 =cut
00203 
00204 
00205 sub checkTableFields {
00206     my ($self,$courseName, $table) = @_;
00207     my $fields_ok = 1;
00208     my %fieldStatus = ();
00209     ##########################################################
00210     # fetch schema from course environment and search database
00211     # for corresponding tables.
00212     ##########################################################
00213     my $db = $self->db;
00214     my $table_name = (exists $db->{$table}->{params}->{tableOverride})? $db->{$table}->{params}->{tableOverride}:$table;
00215     warn "$table_name is a non native table" if $db->{$table}{params}{non_native}; # skip non-native tables
00216     my @schema_field_names =  $db->{$table}->{record}->FIELDS;
00217     my %schema_override_field_names=();
00218     foreach my $field (sort @schema_field_names) {
00219         my $field_name  = $db->{$table}->{params}->{fieldOverride}->{$field} ||$field;
00220         $schema_override_field_names{$field_name}=$field;   
00221         my $database_field_exists = $db->{$table}->tableFieldExists($field_name);
00222         if ($database_field_exists) { 
00223             $fieldStatus{$field} =[SAME_IN_A_AND_B]
00224         } else {
00225             $fields_ok = 0;
00226             $fieldStatus{$field} =[ONLY_IN_A];
00227         }
00228            
00229     }
00230     ##########################################################
00231     # fetch fetch corresponding tables in the database and
00232     # search for corresponding schema entries.
00233     ##########################################################
00234     
00235     my $dbh =$self->dbh;                        # grab any database handle
00236     my $stmt = "SHOW COLUMNS FROM `$table_name`";    # mysql request
00237     my $result = $dbh->selectall_arrayref($stmt) ;
00238     my %database_field_names =  map {${$_}[0]=>[$_]} @$result;             # drill down in the result to the field name level
00239                                                            #  result is array:  Field      | Type     | Null | Key | Default | Extra 
00240     foreach my $field_name (sort keys %database_field_names) {
00241         my $exists = exists($schema_override_field_names{$field_name} );
00242         $fields_ok=0 unless $exists;
00243         $fieldStatus{$field_name} = [ONLY_IN_B] unless $exists;
00244     }
00245     
00246 
00247     return ($fields_ok, \%fieldStatus); # table in both schema & database; found in schema only; found in database only
00248 }
00249 
00250 
00251 =item  $CIchecker->updateTableFields($courseName, $table);
00252 
00253 Checks the fields in the table in the mysql database and insures that they are the same as the ones specified by the databaseLayout
00254 
00255 
00256 =cut
00257 
00258 
00259 sub updateTableFields {
00260     my ($self,$courseName, $table) = @_;
00261     my $msg='';
00262     ##########################################################
00263     # fetch schema from course environment and search database
00264     # for corresponding tables.
00265     ##########################################################
00266     my $db = $self->db;
00267     my $table_name = (exists $db->{$table}->{params}->{tableOverride})? $db->{$table}->{params}->{tableOverride}:$table;
00268     warn "$table_name is a non native table" if $db->{$table}{params}{non_native}; # skip non-native tables
00269     my ($fields_ok, $fieldStatus) = $self->checkTableFields($courseName,$table);
00270     # add fields
00271     foreach my $field_name (keys %$fieldStatus) {
00272         next unless $fieldStatus->{$field_name}->[0] == ONLY_IN_A; 
00273         my $schema_obj = $db->{$table};
00274         if ( $schema_obj->can("add_column_field") ) {
00275             $msg.= "Added column '$field_name' to table '$table'".CGI::br() if $schema_obj->add_column_field($field_name);
00276         }
00277     }
00278     return $msg;
00279     
00280 }

00286 =item $CIchecker->checkCourseDirectories($courseName);
00287 
00288 Checks the course directories to make sure they exist and have the correct
00289 permissions.
00290 
00291 
00292 =cut
00293 
00294 sub checkCourseDirectories {
00295     my ($self) = @_;
00296     my $ce = $self->{ce};
00297     my @webworkDirectories = keys %{$ce->{webworkDirs}};
00298     my @courseDirectories = keys %{$ce->{courseDirs}};
00299     my $str = '';
00300     my @results;
00301     my $directories_ok =1;
00302     foreach my $dir (sort @courseDirectories) {
00303         my $path = $ce->{courseDirs}->{$dir};
00304         my $status = (-e $path) ? 
00305           ((-r $path)?'r':'-') . 
00306           ((-w _ )?'w':'-'   ) .
00307           ((-x _ )?'x':'-'   )    : "missing";
00308  
00309         #all directories should be readable, writable and executable
00310         my $style;
00311         if ($status eq 'rwx') {
00312             $style = "color:green";
00313         } else {
00314             $directories_ok = 0;
00315             $style = "color:red";
00316         }
00317             
00318         push @results, CGI::li( "$dir =>".CGI::span({style=>$style}," $path $status <br/>\n")  );
00319     }
00320     $str = CGI::start_ul(). join(" ",@results) .  CGI::end_ul();
00321     return ( $directories_ok, $str);
00322 }
00323 
00324 =item $CIchecker->updateCourseDirectories($courseName);
00325 
00326 Creates some course directories automatically.
00327 
00328 
00329 =cut
00330 
00331 sub updateCourseDirectories {
00332     my $self = shift;
00333     my $ce = $self->{ce};
00334     my @webworkDirectories = keys %{$ce->{webworkDirs}};
00335     my @courseDirectories = keys %{$ce->{courseDirs}};
00336     
00337     my %updateable_directories = (html_temp=>1,mailmerge=>1,tmpEditFileDir=>1);  #FIXME this is hardwired for the time being.
00338     
00339     foreach my $dir (sort @courseDirectories) {
00340         next unless exists $updateable_directories{$dir};
00341         my $path = $ce->{courseDirs}->{$dir};
00342         unless ( -e $path) {   # if by some unlucky chance the tmpDirectory hasn't been created, create it.
00343             my $parentDirectory =  $path;
00344             $parentDirectory =~s|/$||;  # remove a trailing /
00345             $parentDirectory =~s|/\w*$||; # remove last node
00346             my ($perms, $groupID) = (stat $parentDirectory)[2,5];
00347             WeBWorK::PG::IO::createDirectory($path, $perms, $groupID)
00348                     or warn "Failed to create directory at $path";
00349         
00350         }
00351     }
00352 
00353     return ( );
00354 }

00363 sub lock_database {   # lock named 'webwork.dbugrade' times out after 10 seconds
00364     my $self =shift;
00365     my $dbh = $self->dbh; 
00366     my ($lock_status) = $dbh->selectrow_array("SELECT GET_LOCK('webwork.dbupgrade', 10)");
00367     if (not defined $lock_status) {
00368         die "Couldn't obtain lock because an error occurred.\n";
00369     }
00370     if ($lock_status) {
00371     } else {
00372         die "Timed out while waiting for lock.\n";
00373     }
00374 }
00375 
00376 sub unlock_database {
00377     my $self =shift;
00378     my $dbh = $self->dbh;
00379     my ($lock_status) = $dbh->selectrow_array("SELECT RELEASE_LOCK('webwork.dbupgrade')");
00380     if (not defined $lock_status) {
00381         # die "Couldn't release lock because the lock does not exist.\n";
00382     }elsif ($lock_status) {
00383         return;
00384     } else {
00385         die "Couldn't release lock because the lock is not held by this thread.\n";
00386     }
00387 }

00391 sub load_sql_table_list {
00392     my $self =shift;
00393     my $dbh = $self->dbh;
00394     my $sql_tables_ref = $dbh->selectcol_arrayref("SHOW TABLES");
00395     $self->{sql_tables} = {}; @{$self->{sql_tables}}{@$sql_tables_ref} = ();
00396 }
00397 
00398 sub register_sql_table {
00399     my $self =shift;
00400     my $table = shift;
00401     my $dbh = $self->dbh;
00402     $self->{sql_tables}{$table} = ();
00403 }
00404 
00405 sub unregister_sql_table {
00406     my $self =shift;
00407     my $table = shift;
00408     my $dbh = $self->dbh;
00409     delete $self->{sql_tables}{$table};
00410 }
00411 
00412 sub sql_table_exists {
00413     my $self =shift;
00414     my $table=shift;
00415     my $dbh = $self->dbh;
00416     return exists $self->{sql_tables}{$table};
00417 }

00422 sub ask_permission_stdio {
00423     my ($prompt, $default) = @_;
00424     
00425     $default = 1 if not defined $default;
00426     my $options = $default ? "[Y/n]" : "[y/N]";
00427     
00428     while (1) {
00429         print "$prompt $options ";
00430         my $resp = <STDIN>;
00431         chomp $resp;
00432         return $default if $resp eq "";
00433         return 1 if lc $resp eq "y";
00434         return 0 if lc $resp eq "n";
00435         $prompt = 'Please enter "y" or "n".';
00436     }
00437 }
